items.name: The Twittering Machine
items.description: A watercolor and ink transfer painting created by Paul Klee in 1922. The painting measures 63.5 x 48.3 cm and is part of the collection of the Museum of Modern Art in New York.
items.author: Paul Klee
items.location: Museum of Modern Art, New York

items.name: Remembrance of a Garden
items.description: A watercolor painting on linen paper mounted on cardboard, created in 1914. The painting measures 25.2 x 21.5 cm and is part of the Kunstsammlung Nordrhein-Westfalen in Dusseldorf.
items.author: Paul Klee

items.name: Southern (Tunisian) Gardens
items.description: A watercolor painting by Paul Klee, created in 1919. The painting measures 9.5 x 7.5 in and is part of the Collection Heinz Berggruen in Paris.
items.author: Paul Klee

items.name: Dream City
items.description: A watercolor and oil painting by Paul Klee, created in 1921. The painting measures 18 7/8 x 12 1/4 in and is part of a private collection in Turin.
items.author: Paul Klee

items.name: Ancient Sound, Abstract on Black
items.description: An oil painting by Paul Klee, created in 1925. The painting measures 15 x 15 in and is part of the Kunstsammlung in Basel.
items.author: Paul Klee

items.name: Highway and Byways
items.description: An oil painting by Paul Klee, created in 1929. The painting measures 32 5/8 x 26 3/8 in and is part of the collection of Christoph and Andreas Vowinckel.
items.author: Paul Klee

items.name: Southern Gardens
items.description: An oil painting by Paul Klee, created in 1936. The painting measures 10 3/8 x 12 1/4 in and is part of the collection of Norman Granz in Geneva.
items.author: Paul Klee

items.name: Legend of the Nile
items.description: A pastel painting by Paul Klee, created in 1937. The painting measures 69 x 61 cm (27 1/8 x 24 in) and is made on cotton cloth mounted on burlap. It is currently part of the collection of Kunstmuseum Bern.
items.author: Paul Klee

items.name: Insula Dulcamara
items.description: An oil painting by Paul Klee, created in 1938. The painting measures 31 1/2 x 69 in and is made on newsprint mounted on burlap. It is part of the Klee Foundation's collection in Bern.
items.author: Paul Klee
